title: Budget Linked Budgets Delete Schema
description: Schema for validating a budget linked budgets object

companyUuid.description: The UUID of the company to which the event belongs

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity

budgetItemDetailSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the budget item detail being added or updated

budgetSpendingItemDetailExternalSyncGuid.description: The external Sync GUID of the budget spending item detail being linked
